name: Coven App
description: Collaborated and contributed in ground-level development of an app from start to app store submission

name: Speakfully | SpeakfullyOne/Now/Pro/Pro+
description: Four mobile-responsive pages utlizing a CMS to display route based content. Reusing previously created reusable components(Pricing Page) to display pricing details and a CRM integration. Pricing card styling is conditionally rendered based on a passed in CMS boolean value.

name: Speakfully | Home + Navbar
description: Reworked, and gave a face lift to the global navigation. Created a mobile-responsive page utilizing a CMS to display everything, including the carousel contents. Utilized even/odd children to switch content order.

name: Speakfully | Pricing
description: Reusable pricing cards that conditionally render popularity based on a passed in CMS boolean. A conditionally rendered comparison chart, and a CRM integration. All displayed on a mobile-responsive page utilizing a CMS to display everything.

name: SpeakfullyNow
description: Built Frontend for a web app that allows you to document, submit, and track workplace experiences

name: Speakfully | Partners
description: Mobile-responsive page utilizing a CMS to provide interactive partner-based content, alongside a couple CRM integrations

name: Speakfully | Blog
description: Multiple blog pages utilizing reusable components to display CMS content, keeping users up-to-date with press-releases, interviews, and insider info

name: Speakfully | Meet the Team
description: Mobile-responsive, static page utilizing a CMS to introduce users to the Speakfully team, their descriptions, and social media links

name: Speakfully | Why Speakfully
description: Mobile-responsive, static page providing info through a CMS detailing why Speakfully is a good choice

name: Shiftradr
description: Full CRUD web applicatoin that allows employees to utilize real-time messaging, the ability to post and trade liability of work shifts in a streamlined fashion using a timeline.

name: Form Factor
description: A React web app that utilizes Redux to track your achievements relating to macronutrients, micronutrients, and workout details to provide a chart showing both in tandem with each other over the span of a week.
